title.narrative: Technical Assistance to Reinforce GEQIP-E Ethiopia

description.narrative: The TARGET Programme is a £19.5M project that provides support to the Federal Ministry of Education (FMoE) and Regional Education Bureaus (REBs) to strengthen the delivery of the $440M+ World Bank GEQIP-E ‘Programme for Results’ (P4R). This TA component is integrated (has the same business case) with additional £90m of DFID financial assistance to GEQIP-E via MDTF (Multi Donor Trust Fund)
